briefTitle: Efficacy of Voriconazole Loaded Spanlastics Gel Versus Clotriamazole Cream on Treating Vulvovaginal Candidasis
officialTitle: Efficacy of Voriconazole Loaded Spanlastics Gel Versus Clotriamazole Cream on Treating Vulvovaginal Candidasis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: efficacy of nano voriconazole versus Clotrimazole in Treatment of vaginal candidiasis albicans and removal of symptoms
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patients aging from 20 t0 40 years old suffering from vulvovaginal candidiasis caused by albicans species.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant women, female suffering from vulvovaginal candidiasis caused by other species rather than C. albicans.
